variablemanipulations

variablemanipulations.Rmd
library(finddataanalysis)
#> Warning: replacing previous import 'ggplot2::last_plot' by 'plotly::last_plot'

temperature_groups 


df = data.frame(ID = c(1:20), Temperature = runif(20, 36, 42))
temperature_groups(data.var = df, temperature = "Temperature")
#>    ID Temperature TEMP_CATEG
#> 1   1    36.48450    36-36.9
#> 2   2    41.00600        ≥39
#> 3   3    39.60457        ≥39

age_groups 

df = data.frame(ID = c(1:20), age = round(runif(20, 3, 86)))
age_groups(data.var = df, age = "age", lim1=5, lim2=11, lim3=18, lim4=45, lim5=60)
#>    ID age AGE_CATEG
#> 1   1  27     18-44
#> 2   2  59     45-59
#> 3   3  64       ≥60
#> 4   4  19     18-44
#> 5   5  84       ≥60
#> 6   6  65       ≥60
#> 7   7   7      5-10
#> 8   8  47     45-59
#> 9   9  61       ≥60
#> 10 10  60       ≥60
#> 11 11   6      5-10
#> 12 12  22     18-44
#> 13 13  28     18-44
#> 14 14  56     45-59
#> 15 15  43     18-44
#> 16 16  39     18-44
#> 17 17  62       ≥60
#> 18 18  82       ≥60
#> 19 19  18     18-44
#> 20 20  21     18-44
df = data.frame(ID = c(1:20), AGE = round(runif(20, 3, 25)))
age_groups(data.var = df, age = "AGE", lim1=5, lim2=11, lim3=18)
#>    ID AGE AGE_CATEG
#> 1   1  18       ≥18
#> 2   2  14     11-17
#> 3   3  17     11-17
#> 4   4  18       ≥18
#> 5   5   5      5-10
#> 6   6  20       ≥18
#> 7   7  20       ≥18
#> 8   8  25       ≥18
#> 9   9  24       ≥18
#> 10 10  12     11-17
#> 11 11  13     11-17
#> 12 12  10      5-10
#> 13 13   7      5-10
#> 14 14  15     11-17
#> 15 15  14     11-17
#> 16 16  20       ≥18
#> 17 17   7      5-10
#> 18 18  19       ≥18
#> 19 19   4        <5
#> 20 20  11     11-17

age_dob_process 

library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'dplyr'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:base':
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
library(lubridate)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'lubridate'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:base':
#> 
#>     date, intersect, setdiff, union


my_data <- data.frame(
  ID = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5),
  age = c(25, NA, 30, NA, NA),
  dob = c("1980-01-15", "1995-03-22", "1975-08-10", "1988-11-05", "2000-09-30"),
  date_enrollment = c("2023-05-10", "2022-12-01", "2022-02-18", "2023-02-05", "2021-07-20")
)

# Display the data
print(my_data)
#>   ID age        dob date_enrollment
#> 1  1  25 1980-01-15      2023-05-10
#> 2  2  NA 1995-03-22      2022-12-01
#> 3  3  30 1975-08-10      2022-02-18
#> 4  4  NA 1988-11-05      2023-02-05
#> 5  5  NA 2000-09-30      2021-07-20

# Apply the age_dob_process function to the data
age_dob_process(data.var=my_data, age.var = "age", dob.var = "dob", date.var = "date_enrollment", lim1 = 30, lim2 = 40)
#>   ID age        dob date_enrollment AGE_CALC AGE_CATEG
#> 1  1  25 1980-01-15      2023-05-10 25.00000       <30
#> 2  2  NA 1995-03-22      2022-12-01 27.69610      <NA>
#> 3  3  30 1975-08-10      2022-02-18 30.00000     30-39
#> 4  4  NA 1988-11-05      2023-02-05 34.25051      <NA>
#> 5  5  NA 2000-09-30      2021-07-20 20.80219      <NA>
